definition: Mongol ethnic group/abbr. for Mongolia 蒙古國|蒙古国[Meng3 gu3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Meng2]
to cover/ignorant/to suffer (misfortune)/to receive (a favor)/to cheat
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: The Dogon are best known for their masked dances, wooden sculptures and architecture.
sentences.chinese: 多貢是最著名的爲他們的蒙面舞蹈，木雕和建築。

sentences.english: Tom howled  the news that some masked men held up a bank.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆喊叫着說，有幾個蒙面人搶劫了銀行。

sentences.english: Japanese troops in pursuit of Xue Chai, rescued by a masked man.
sentences.chinese: 鬼子部隊來追擊薛釵，被蒙面人救下了。

sentences.english: QinQiong came to changan, suddenly by a masked people appointment.
sentences.chinese: 秦瓊來到長安，忽然被一蒙面人士約見。

sentences.english: He was set upon by two masked men.
sentences.chinese: 他遭到兩個蒙面人的襲擊。

sentences.english: The masked men ghosted across the moonlit yard.
sentences.chinese: 蒙面人像幽靈一般穿過月光下的院落。

sentences.english: Quickly create your masked affiliate link in less than 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 快速建立您的蒙面分公司聯繫，在不到5分鐘。

sentences.english: Because of the flexibility of the new masked people like to use this.
sentences.chinese: 因爲有彈性，新近的蒙面人都喜歡用這個。

sentences.english: So it ended up as Kakashi's special feature.
sentences.chinese: 所以我就以卡卡西的蒙面作爲結束。

sentences.english: He told the police that he had been beaten up by two masked men.
sentences.chinese: 他告訴警察說兩個蒙面人把他痛打了一頓。

sentences.english: This displays the original image, masked with the current selection.
sentences.chinese: 這顯示原始圖像，蒙面與當前的選擇。

sentences.english: Two masked men rushed into the bank.
See, lenient to recognize themselves and masked hide no more.
sentences.chinese: 德諾見嶽靈珊認出了自己便也不再蒙面隱藏。

sentences.english: Three masked men robbed a bank.
sentences.chinese: 三名蒙面人搶劫了一家銀行。

sentences.english: Two masked men sprang out flora behind a tree.
sentences.chinese: 兩個蒙面人突然從樹後邊冒了出來。

sentences.english: A masked member of Hamas surveys the rubble of a house in Jebaliyah.
sentences.chinese: 傑巴利亞，一名蒙面哈馬斯成員察看被炸燬的房屋。

definition: face flannel or towel/shroud (over the face of a corpse)
black clothes/servant (old)/young woman role in Chinese opera, also called 正旦[zheng4 dan4]
Chinese-style long robe worn as outermost garment/burqa
